name: My map
description: An OpenLayers-powered Lit Web Component map for tasks related to planning permission in the UK.

examples.title: Basemap: Ordnance Survey vector tiles
examples.description: Requires access to the Ordnance Survey Vector Tiles API, fallsback to OpenStreetMap basemap if no key provided.

examples.title: Basemap: Ordnance Survey raster tiles
examples.description: Requires access to the Ordnance Survey API, fallsback to OpenStreetMap basemap if no key provided.

examples.title: Draw mode
examples.description: Draw and modify a site plan boundary with a red line. Use eventListeners to calculate the total area and get the GeoJSON representation of the polygon.

examples.title: Show features at point
examples.description: Show the Ordnance Survey Features that intersect with a given coordinate.
examples.template:
<my-map
        showFeaturesAtPoint
        latitude="51.4858363"
        longitude="-0.0761246"
        featureColor="#8a2be2" 
        osFeaturesApiKey="" 
        osVectorTilesApiKey="" />

examples.title: Click to select and merge features
examples.description: Show features at point plus ability to click to select or deselect additional features to create a more accurate full site boundary.
examples.template:
<my-map
        showFeaturesAtPoint
        clickFeatures
        latitude="51.4854329"
        longitude="-0.0761992"
        featureColor="Magenta" 
        osFeaturesApiKey="" 
        osVectorTilesApiKey="" />

examples.title: Show a GeoJSON polygon on a static map
examples.description: Show a custom GeoJSON polygon on an OS basemap and hide the zoom & reset control buttons.

examples.title: Display a scale bar on the map
examples.description: Display a scale bar on the map for orientation, choose between the default or "bar" styles offered by OpenLayers
